about.content: Semikolan in collaboration with GDSC UIT-RGPV invites you to Bhopal’s first-ever UX meetup. Level up your career in design with some amazing talks, panel discussions and networking sessions with our guests. If you love the design and meeting interesting folks, don’t miss this chance. It is the first UX meet-up in Bhopal and the second in central India i.e. Madhya Pradesh. There will be a pannel discussion and talks over product design and all.

speakers.title: Garmia Mehta
speakers.experience: Sr. Product Designer at PayU | Ex- Infosys, EY, Microsoft
